== Description ==

Enable or disable term counting.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php wp_defer_term_counting( $defer ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$defer|boolean|Optional. Enable if true, disable if false.|optional|}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||bool|Whether term counting is enabled or disabled.}}
